Troféu 1704 BMW 2002tii 1973 Österreichische Alpenfahrt (Austrian Alpine Rally) Winner A. Warmbold/J. Todt

Purchased: 2012

1973 would be the only year to see the WRC hold an event in Austria. It was also the first win for a BMW in the World Rally Championship at the hands of privateer Achim Warmbold. This model is very hard to find (only made by Troféu). I noticed that the only die cast part on this model may be the base. I had to take it apart and repair a broken wheel and the body is so light it must be plastic.
